thoughts.text: I have the top attractions in the world. I can use the write_to_file command to write the attractions to a file.
thoughts.reasoning: I have the top attractions in the world and I want to save them for later reference. The write_to_file command can be used to write the attractions to a file.
thoughts.plan: - Use the write_to_file command to write the top attractions in the world to a file.
thoughts.speak: I have the top attractions in the world. I can use the write_to_file command to write the attractions to a file.

args.text:
The top attractions in the world, according to Tripadvisor's Travelers' Choice, are:
- Santuario Historico de Machu Picchu in Peru
- Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque Center in Abu Dhabi
- St. Peter's Basilica in Vatican City
- Angkor Wat in Cambodia
